title: Reciprocity
description: The final installment of the Breach Trilogy!Things are finally looking up for Nathan and Lila. Though separated at work, their life together is just beginning.They’re working hard to lock up Lila’s past, when Nathan’s comes knocking at the door with a gift—a warning that happiness can, and will, be taken away.Is running away the only option to stay alive? Can they ever find the peace they deserve?The battle for survival has begun.
author: K.I. Lynn
